entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 p.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
